name: Swap to sticky header on scroll within the same frame workaround
description:
The standard workaround with different copies of the same page won't work on larger projects, so I was looking for a way to be able to swap to a sticky header after a specific amount of scroll, but within the same frame design. Here's the result with some added notes to make it easier to understand.

If it helped you, leave a like and a comment and share with your friends :)
